custom-meta.meta-value: Data are made available according to the NOAA Plan for Increasing Public Access to Research Results which contains activities that will be undertaken by NOAA to meet the goals and requirements of the White House Office of Science and Technology Policy Memo "Increasing Access to the Results of Federally Funded Scientific Research issued 2013 February 22 ( http://www.whitehouse.gov/sites/default/files/microsites/ostp/ostp_public_access_memo_2013.pdf). Data are available as a Supporting Information file.
